title: rf based substation/feeder monitoring system- from aug 2011 to may 2012.
this is detects different fault conditions (over voltage, under voltage & over current)
of feeder lines & monitors the feeder lines continuously and sends the information about the
abnormal conditions to substation through radio frequency signal.
this is very useful in rural area and those areas which are far from the
substations and the communication system is poor or not available.
